original_text: And of every living thing of all flesh, you shall bring two of every sort into the ark to keep them alive with you. They shall be male and female.
korean_text: 혈육 있는 모든 생물을 너는 각기 암수 한 쌍씩 방주로 이끌어들여 너와 함께 생명을 보존하게 하되

sentences.original_text: And of every living thing of all flesh,
you shall bring two of every sort into the ark
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 그 종류대로 두 마리씩 방주로 가져오라

sentences.original_text: to keep them alive with you.
They shall be male and female.
